description: 'We needed someone as strong as Rodgers'
title: 'We needed someone as strong as Rodgers'
title_page: 'We needed someone as strong as Rodgers' - BBC Sport
maintext:
Just one sleep to go! The new season is nearly upon so, so get in the mood with our podcast previewing what lies in store for Celtic.
David Currie and Al Lamont are joined by Celtic fan and podcaster Paul John Dykes - give it a listen here.
